title: "Oh Man, I'm a Bard Yo!" - A Guide to Bards
itunes:title: "Oh Man, I'm a Bard Yo!" - A Guide to Bards
description:
Ever been slightly reticent to play a Bard? Well, we're here to debunk misconceptions of the oft-stereotyped singing bard and convince you! We're deep-diving into one of the most flexible classes out there, the Bard.

Follow Jonathan Charles: @the_lonely_orchestra

Link to 'On Hostile Ground': https://www.royalandderngate.co.uk/made-in-northampton/current-season/on-hostile-ground/


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com
